Meerkat hasnâ€™t thrown in the towel. Itâ€™s fighting smarter, as well it must against heavy hitter Twitter. The startupÂ launched its official public API back in May, but had already been letting developers dip in in private. TheÂ Meerkat APIÂ letsÂ developers pull arrays of all current or scheduled streams, plusÂ detailsÂ such asÂ comments and watchers. The new embed feature removes even moreÂ friction to encourage developers to get involved.
